name: RD Global Inc, Software Development & Consulting Company USA
description: RD Global’s mission is to create digital solutions that solve real-world problems for our customers through human centered design and agile software development. Our people-focused approach doesn’t end with what we build; we cultivate a culture of trust. We are an innovative digital agency providing software solutions on the Microsoft ecosystem. With a growing number of highly skilled professionals in United States and India, we help our clients better engage their customers, optimize their operations, and develop innovative products.
business_objectives: Accelerate Skill Development and Learning Efficiency
Build a More Diverse and Inclusive Workforce
sub_categories: Software and Services Related to HR Software
Headline: RD Global: Elevating Digital Experience for Insurance Companies
ShortDescription: RD Global specializes in software development, web & mobile apps, IT consulting, and digital transformation. We empower businesses to thrive in the digital age.
enhanced_description: RD Global is an innovative digital agency specializing in human-centered and agile software development, web & mobile app development, IT consulting, and digital transformation services. Operating on the Microsoft ecosystem with skilled professionals in the United States and India, they empower clients to better engage customers, optimize operations, and develop innovative products. Their expertise extends to providing software and services related to HR solutions, specifically focusing on helping organizations accelerate skill development, improve learning efficiency, enhance employee happiness and engagement, and build a more diverse and inclusive workforce.
key_use_cases: Accelerating skill development and learning efficiency
Building a more diverse and inclusive workforce
competitive_advantages: Leveraging a growing number of highly skilled professionals in the United States and India (dual-shore model)
